description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Cinnamon Wars: Empire Over Bark.

hook.text: Three European empires went to war over tree bark. The prize? Control of the cinnamon trade.

buildup.text: True cinnamon grows only in Sri Lanka. Portuguese colonizers seized the island's supply in 1505.

climax.text: True Ceylon cinnamon is delicate and complex. Cassia is what most people have actually tasted.

punchline.text: Empires fought over a spice most people have never tasted.
